mapper.select: SELECT `artist`.`name` as aname , `artist`.`id` as aid , `product`.`id` , `product`.`name` , `product`.`introduction` , `product`.`details` , `product`.`inventory` , `product`.`original` , `product`.`current` , `product`.`byTheTime` , `product`.`byTheTime` , `product`.`texture` , `product`.`size` , `product`.`ImagePath` , `product`.`dateIssued` FROM `arts`.`artist` INNER JOIN `arts`.`product` ON (`artist`.`id` = `product`.`aid` AND `product`.`id` = #{id}) ;
